text: Ravi Yerrigadoo (born c. 1974) is a Mauritian politician. Yerrigadoo is of Hindu descent. He was elected to the National Assembly in 2000 via the Best Loser System. Aged 26 at the time, Yerrigadoo was also named minister of Youth and Sports. He ran in the 2005 Mauritian local election. == References == Category:1974 births Category:Mauritian politicians
title: Ravi Yerrigadoo
